column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I did wish that the museum had more historical context - like visually showing us what else was happening when certain pieces were being made. The timeline at the Modern European exhibit's entry does this a little
column2: and sometimes it's mentioned in the piece's text or in the audioguide but I would have liked to SEE it throughout the exhibits. I think I especially wanted this because I wanted to understand which artists were contemporaries with each other
column3: what was happening in the world when the pieces were created
column4: etc. and how much overlap was there between different periods in art.
